title: Tobacco Liability Act
context: [CHAPTER 675] TOBACCO LIABILITY ACT Section 675-1 Findings and purpose 675-2 Definitions 675-3 Requirements Note The style of this chapter varies from the HRS because the precise form of this chapter was necessary as agreed on in the master settlement agreement to avoid nonpayment by tobacco manufacturers. Cross References Hawaii tobacco settlement moneys, see chapter 328L. Tobacco products reporting, see chapter 486P.
